AWFUL GAME

I'm not exactly sure why this game is so addictive, but I can't stop. Every match is something new and exciting no matter how you play. There's always new challenges through the Rifts and new DLCs being released which keep things from getting stale. It's gory, adrenaline-inducing, and crazy fun.

살구

GROSS DEVELOPING!

I started DbD in 2016 when the game was in a very early state.

The game "grew" over the years into a direction I CAN'T and WON'T support!

My feelings while playing this game are not even close anymore to fun or excitement. Its most likely do be frustraited, dissapointed, annoyed and sad when you interact with other players. I dont play the game very often anymore due sertain reasons I'm going to talk about.

First of all:
COMMUNITY:
The Community of the game is extremnly Toxic and nobody these days plays for fun anymore, but only for winning and ruining others fun! 

Second:
GAME BALANCE:
The Developers of the game keep leading the game balance into a single direction and not balancing it out between both sides! I dont main any side, but I can clearly say that the game is KILLER SIDED where I know many ppl dont agree. From my point of view I can say that whenever I play Killer in this game i rather get an super easy 4k with Dogsh!t survivors, or I get annihilated by SWF, but I dont judge the game based on SWF but on pure random Matchmaking. Whenever I play survivor I get absolutly gross Teammates, and the most unfair gameplay Killers you face in this game, tunneling, camping, abusing unfair gamebugs, also many Killer in this game dont play fair in terms of cheating and hacking, lagswitch beeing a thing the Devs never actually looked into! 

Third thing:
PHYSICS and MECANICS:
The game mecanics, physics and hitboxes are absolutly horrible and unfitting in sertain situations. Talking about M1 hits when a Killer isnt even facing you for beeing 2 meters away, hitting you behind pallets or behind windows, aswell as the overall Server/Ping problems in the game.

Fouth point:
CHASES:
This is probaply just a personal thing BUT, since the Devs addet Range Killers they ruined every aspect of a normal chase in DbD, it's miserable to face Range Killers that hit you across pallets, through windows or can zone you out with you having absolutly 0 counterplay!
Back in the days where you had fair Killers to go against, where you could actually use your resources to your advanatge and not to anyway get hit, it was super fun to get into chases and you never had a problem with failing at some point, aslong as the chase was fun.
The fun factor in chases isnt given anymore with the current state.

Fifth and last thing:
BIGGEST ISSUE!: DC Penalty! 

The Developers of the game FORCE you to play with unfair ppl, let them be Toxic or even a Hacker! You need to waste your time in such matches having no fun or going afk, cause if you leave the match you get punished for simply avoiding a toxic and/or unfair game!

I wish this "feature" would have never been addet, since then i quit DbD for the most part cause I dont enjoy wasting my lifetime..!


UPDATE: Mid Chapter Update 2022:

So i've only played a few hours now since the release of the Mid Chapter Update of 2022, but I can tell that the game once again have gone into a direction I absolutly dont support. Many changed sound nice on paper, but experiencing most of these changes in the game are absolutly horrible and dont help to improve the players experience of fun while playing. 
In about 90% of my games I got camped to death on 1st hook, most chases only lastet seconds cause most Maps are just horrible in therms of the structures setup. The Community still is toxic and it feels like most players in this game, especially talking about Killers, don't play DbD to have fun, but play DbD to ruin other pps experience and time. I dont even blame random Teammates while playing survivor for beeing absolutly potatoe or trash. But I blame the game for not balancing out the skill of Survivors and Killers in a fair way. 

It's so sad that this game is the way it is now. Its fun if you go against fair ppl which is the most rarest thing to actually have happen to you, But its also extremly frustraiting and misserable to play when you face toxic ppl which sadly is the bigger part in the Community.
It is a great game! Only wish you could have more options with controls, like being able to toggle crouch not have t hold it the whole time.

Но минус в том, что если зайдет донатер и простой пользователь, если начнут игру с одного левела, то играть легче донатеру и за маньяка и за сурва. ТОПОВАЯ ИГРА САВЕТУЮ

現状最も買ってはいけないゲームの一つだと断言します。
初心者にとってはサバイバーもキラーも適さない上に、練習させる気のないガバガバなマッチング(初心者でも最高ランクにあたる可能性が十二分にあります)、おまけに不具合の修正も遅く、テストサーバーでの多くの反対意見を無視してのパークの弱体化。正直調子に乗っているとしか言えません。以前に発表のあったマッチング改善の進捗は如何ですか？幅広いキラーが使われるようになる環境整備は？ホラーゲームとは何だったのでしょうか。今の環境ではボイスチャットでの協力プレイが普通。工具箱持ち込み＆複数人による開始30秒での発電機点灯。10分のマッチを目指しているとは微塵も感じられません。まだ初めて間もないプレイヤーとして言わせてもらえば、ここまでフラストレーションの溜まるゲームは初めてです。上達した人が初心者を蹂躙する、今の世界で多くの人はそれを望んでいるんでしょうね。キラーが接近しても発電機を回し続け、攻撃を受けても発電機に齧りついて回し切る。確かに一つの戦略かもしれませんね。ですがそんな状況でもキラー側の行動は何も変化しない。ただ切るだけ。そんなものが殺人鬼なんて名前を持っている。ちゃんちゃら可笑しいですね。持ち物をハリセンにでも換えたらどうですか。多少複雑化したとしても殺人鬼にバリエーションがある方が生き物らしいですよ。肉食動物から草食動物は当然逃げる、肉食動物は生きる為に追う。殺人鬼がエンティティの代行者として追いかけているだけで儀式も本来同じはずでしょう。草食動物にも抵抗があるにしても、今のDBDでは肉食動物は赤子が出てきて、草食動物の代わりにチーターが出てきているようなものでしょう。これでお金をやり取りしてるんですからもっと真摯に取り組んでいただきたいです。新キラーが出るたびに「面白そうだ、買おうかな」と思った次の思考は、「でもどうせBP貯まらなくて育成できないから買わない」となるわけです。古参が新参より不遇になれとは微塵も思いません。自分が押さえつけられる立場になったのを考えるとやはり辛いですから。ですが経歴を持っている人でもキラーとサバイバーの相反する立場になった瞬間に片方が不遇な立場にいるのはやはり納得できる話ではないでしょう。せめて対等。抵抗するためとはいえ、誰もが小型ナイフやガラス片を常備して自発的にではない形で、行われている儀式に参加しているなど有り得ないでしょう。足が速い、皆を率いるリーダーシップを備えている、猟師の知識を知っていて罠を安全に解除できる。そんな人間もいるでしょう。だがみんなが同じものをほぼ確実に備えており、それによって本来迫害する立場のはずの殺人鬼を迫害する。荒唐無稽な話ですね。勧善懲悪も素晴らしいかもしれませんが、死霊や怨霊、はたまたバケモノと呼ぶにふさわしい者たちを殴り飛ばすような真似ができるわけないでしょう。逃げ惑うのが生存のために足掻く者たちの本懐、このゲームがホラーゲームと呼ぶに相応しいゲームに戻ってくれることを祈っています。
